Name: Name Unknown
Description:
Within two days two persons, described as a “cross-dresser” and a “eunuch” have been murdered in a place usually frequented by trans people. Both bodies showed signs of brutal torture and were burned.

“Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide” research project: The Express Tribune, November 8, 2010

Name: Emanuelly Colaço Tabordo
Description:
The victim was a sex worker, who was strangled with her own blouse.

“Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide” research project: Correi do Litoral 12.11.2010 and Parana Online 12.11.2010

Name: Rani
Description:
The victim was strangled with a dupatta, a traditional scarf.

“Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide” research project: Times of India, 14.11.2010

Description: “Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide” research project: Jornal A Hora Online, 15.11.2010

Name: Gretchen de Ogum ("Greth")
Source ref: 24 Nov 2010/Greth de Ogum (Lirio Santo da Silva)
Description:
Greth had just finished shopping at a food market and got into her car when she was shot twice in the mouth by two men on a motorbike.

She was a well-known Afro-religious leader (Mãe-de-santo). 

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna da Bahia, online portal, 25.11.2010

http://www.agmarrios.com.br/2010/11/grethen-de-ogum-assassinado-em-ipira.html

https://noticiasdeitabuna.blogspot.com/2010_11_21_archive.html

https://policiaeviola.blogspot.com/2010_11_21_archive.html

Name: Adriana
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Asociación Silueta X, 21.02.2011

Name: Idania Roberta Sevilla Raudales ("Robertina")
Description:
Robertina owned a beauty salon. She was found dead in her own apartment more than 24 hours after she had been killed. Her hands and feet were tied together, and her throat had been cut.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La prensa, online portal, 29.11.2010

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=1627788133306&set=a.2361225428780&type=3&theater

Name: Marcinha
Description:
Marcinha was shot in her own apartment.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010)

Name: Sandra (Sandro Heleno)
Description:
Sandra was the owner of a boarding house for travestis. She was shot in the mouth.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010) 2 ----------------------- Page 3-----------------------

Name: Valentina (Oscar Andres Triana Lozano)
Description:
Valentina's body was found on 28 November in a state of decomposition in a tank. She had been missing for eight days. The eyes and one hand were missing. Locals assume that swine living in the area ate the hand. Relatives belief that Valentina became a victim of hatred of travestis. She had moved from Medellin to Ibague recently.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Ecos del Combeima, online portal, 29.11.2010; El Tiempo, online portal (w/o date)

Name: Alison
Description:
Alison was a hairdresser and was found half naked.

Note that the date of this report is unknown. The date given is based on the position of the corresponding entry in the TGEU list.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Asociación Silueta X, 21.02.2011 December 2010
